channel.title: Would like to no how to script!
channel.description:
I would like to learn how to script i woulf like to learn alot of stuff please send me emails to teach me i would like to make 1337 scripts i need a leet scripter!!! lol please send in someemails about it.I need some one with skill.i have a few scripts i would like to learn to make my self. wood cuting,some collecting/banker,fishing and others.i will need to be taken into it by steps.Someone please help me
email: gameness420@netscape.com

item.title: Would like to no how to script!
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

I would suggest that you didn’t ask for so much at one time first of all and then I would suggest that you look at the FAQ’s and Tutorials list.

Read full topic

item.title: Would like to no how to script!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

No, the SCAR scripters are not here to spoon feed you. Read the tutorials, learn it for yourself. If you come across something that no matter what you do it will not work, then ask. Also, you might want to learn to spell before trying to write a script, it will help in the long run.

Read full topic
